entry.title: $1885 // **Rent Stabilized**LARGE Sunny 1 bedroom - small pets ok!
entry.content:
**Rent Stabilized**LARGE Sunny 1 bedroom - small pets ok!

Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Apartment Amenities

Eat In Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Renovated

SUCH A STEAL! Spacious 1 bedroom apartment -->newly renovated <-- separate windowed eat in kitchen Apartment features: - spacious bedroom - plenty of storage - bright kitchen with space for dining area - renovated bathroom - hardwood floors thought out apartment - great natural lighting - high ceilings - heat hot water is included --> rent stabilized!! Laundromat right across the street and 1min to supermarket --5min to subway! I have many other listings in the area and look forward in helping you finding your new home!

Contact me via call, text or email to schdeule a viewing!

Olga Breise

Phone: (646) 836-1673
Email: olga@bouklisgroup.com

The Bouklis Group
